column1: #Text=Korra says : " Once we 're inside , you go find Jinora .
#Text=Worst - case scenario : so we 're fighting Unalaq , you close the portals and let 's just say something happens to you .
#Text=Are we going to be trapped in there for eternity ?
#Text=" Korra says : " If everything goes as planned , we 'll all walk out together after Harmonic Convergence .
